page.title: 08JUNIOR SCHOOL, SOUTHWELL (2)
page.content: There are fourteen{classes;}three first year ,three second year,four third year and four fourth year. There is a{remedial teacher}who gives some children help if they need it, and a full time secretary. The school hours are 8.55am to 12,OOpm and 1.15pm to 3.4Opm. Some children who live in outlying villages come on the school bus. The{uniform}is grey trousers, blue shirt, maroon or grey, sweater and school tie for the boys, while the girls, a maroon skirt, cardigan or jumper, blue blouse and a school tie. Children are expected to wear the uniform. There are various diferent lessons: language and reading development, mathematics, social studies, art and craft.
